file_content.text: Looks like you're still in one piece. I guess Natho's virus must have worked. Makes me feel better about asking for more.
Natho's heard that a new batch of those same probe droids are ready to ship out to Imperial forces across the galaxy.
We've hit the Empire on Balmorra, but we could strike a real blow if we sabotaged those droids before they ship.
Natho's idea, not mine. Guess he's not all crazy.
The Okara Droid Factory is controlled by the Empire. You'll have your pick of Imperials shooting at you.
Natho's plan has worked so far. Might as well finish.
Head for the assembly line inside the Okara Droid Factory. You'll find the probe droid shipments nearby.
Natho will be waiting for you at a resistance camp nearby. Ought to be tickled pink if this works.
